description: Shape domain concept relationships from the story map. Collaborators should come from stories showing how concepts work together to accomplish user goals.

guidance.description: Identify collaborators from stories showing how concepts interact to deliver value
example: Story: User rebalances portfolio to target allocation
Generates trades to achieve target allocation: Trade, Portfolio, TargetAllocation
Compares current allocation to target: AllocationDifference, Portfolio, TargetAllocation
(Collaborators Portfolio, TargetAllocation, Trade, AllocationDifference come from story)

dont.description: Don't invent collaborators not present in stories

guidance.description: Don't add collaborators that aren't implied by the stories
example: Get audit log: AuditLog (WRONG: not in story)
Get version history: Version (WRONG: not in story)
(Audit, versioning not mentioned in stories - don't add)
